response.msg:
嗯，用户要求我整理张远否认与王霏霏恋情的相关信息。需要从搜索结果中提取关键内容，并按照引用编号格式在回答中标注来源。

在这些搜索结果中，张远在《披荆斩棘2025》节目中明确回应了感情状态。他提到恋爱是"低调的两个人事情"，目前没有确定的恋爱计划。当被问及与王霏霏的舞台CP传闻时，张远表示"磕不磕是你们的事"，强调两人合作纯属舞台设计。他还称赞王霏霏"业务能力非常强"。

节目中有个细节，李承铉曾公开撮合两人，张远当场捂脸喊"闭嘴，走开"，显示出对私人话题的回避态度。绯闻起源于两人在节目中的合作舞台《我的快乐》，舞蹈包含托举、依偎等亲密动作，被观众评价"眼神拉丝、甜度爆表"。

部分网友指出节目组通过刻意安排提问和剪辑来制造话题。张远粉丝质疑节目"靠绯闻薅热度"。而张远的回应被评价为"高情商"和"体面"，既肯定王霏霏的专业性，又保护双方隐私。

关于两人现实状态，张远此前陷入与刘美含的分手传闻（七夕隐晦发文、互相取关），王霏霏则被曝遭家人催婚。两人节目外零互动，且均处于事业上升期。

公众对此事看法分为两派：CP粉认为舞台化学反应难得，"明知非真仍想磕"；理性派则呼吁尊重隐私，强调"关注作品＞脑补私生活"。

张远近期专注音乐事业，跨年演唱会正在筹备。整个事件折射出娱乐圈"舞台CP商业化"的常见矛盾。

我会在回答中组织这些信息，突出张远的回应要点、绯闻起源、节目组角色、公众反应和艺人现状等关键方面，并确保每个要点都有对应的引用编号。

张远在《披荆斩棘2025》节目中正式否认了与王霏霏的恋情传闻，并回应了个人感情状态，以下是综合多方信息的关键要点：
### 一、张远回应的核心内容
1. **明确否认恋情**
张远表示与王霏霏的合作纯属舞台设计，强调两人因专业配合呈现了默契表演，但不存在私人恋情。面对节目中的CP传闻，他回应：“磕不磕是你们的事”，既尊重观众自由解读，也划清现实边界。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 8, 41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "潇湘晨报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227890204746175", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "浅椿夏梦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227936880008654", "index": 41, "label": ""}], "name": "潇湘晨报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.826.826.50/001O24LNly8h8viu4nck1j60my0myq3m02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=fWVL9wWpvh", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227890204746175", "vType": 3}}```
2. **个人感情观与现状**
他称恋爱是“低调的两个人事情”，目前没有确定的恋爱计划，对感情持开放态度，但现阶段更专注事业。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 8, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "潇湘晨报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227890204746175", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "Kep1er-迪亚斯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227935381589158", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **抵制过度撮合**
节目中李承铉曾公开询问王霏霏单身状态并试图撮合，张远当场捂脸喊“闭嘴，走开”，显露出对私人话题的回避态度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 8, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "潇湘晨报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227890204746175", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "BunierJovu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227936397396632", "index": 15, "label": ""}]}}```
潇湘晨报

### 二、绯闻发酵背景
1. **舞台合作引发猜测**
两人在《披荆斩棘2025》合作双人舞《我的快乐》，因舞蹈动作包含托举、依偎等亲密互动，被观众评价“眼神拉丝、甜度爆表”。李承铉、王栎鑫等嘉宾的现场起哄进一步推动CP热度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [8, 9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "青青小萌芽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228059499429995", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "青青小萌芽", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.622.622.50/006ryvnxly8hm3h3nyxbkj30ha0hadgx.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=2NpvJhJUqg", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228059499429995", "vType": 0}}```
2. **节目组被质疑炒作**
部分网友指出，节目组通过刻意安排提问、剪辑亲密互动营造话题。张远粉丝质疑节目“靠绯闻薅热度”，认为艺人专注舞台的初衷被模糊。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [8, 31, 36, 38], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "迷鹭迷鹭", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227980247009341", "index": 38, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "bird读者创", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227931372883782", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "Kep1er-迪亚斯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227937436532826", "index": 36, "label": ""}], "name": "迷鹭迷鹭", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/699c639bly1i1o43ra2tjj20u00u0whp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=OB4MgZFleB", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227980247009341", "vType": 0}}```
3. **双方现实状态分析**
- 张远此前陷入与刘美含的分手传闻（七夕隐晦发文、互相取关），但始终未正面回应；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [1, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "潇湘晨报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227890204746175", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "明日旻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227935231378793", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- 王霏霏被曝遭家人催婚，两人节目外零互动，且均处于事业上升期，被指“时间地点全错位”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [8, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "明日旻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227935231378793", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
青青小萌芽

### 三、公众与行业反应
1. **CP粉与理性派冲突**
- 支持者认为舞台化学反应难得，“明知非真仍想磕”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [6, 9, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我叫善妍啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227932819920848", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "夜欣星辰", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228059693155312", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "青青小萌芽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228059499429995", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "我叫善妍啊", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1079.1079.50/006bb5Haly8i6vvqmk12dj30tz0u0gos.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=%2F15SctBfRg", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227932819920848", "vType": 0}}```
- 反对者呼吁尊重隐私，强调“关注作品＞脑补私生活”，并提及沈腾马丽等因极端CP粉受害的先例。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [19, 20, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "错位指节", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227953064512583", "index": 20, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "少女灰萌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227953101472959", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "能酱娱乐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227933348397639", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "错位指节", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/007cKEKAly8i6uswudcx0j30u00u0js6.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=5lnxspEhZR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227953064512583", "vType": 0}}```
2. **张远回应获赞高情商**
其回应被评价“体面周全”：既肯定王霏霏的专业性，又保护双方隐私，同时不干涉观众娱乐自由，被称作“理性边界感示范”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [3, 8, 33, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "帧间雨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227947801975581", "index": 42, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "矢野珉", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227928562436739", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "Kep1er-迪亚斯", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227935381589158", "index": 33, "label": ""}], "name": "帧间雨", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006VgdKUly8i6w1yiyky2j30u00u0dir.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=lcBg4scUgC", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227947801975581", "vType": 0}}```
夜欣星辰

### 四、事件本质与后续影响
此次风波折射出娱乐圈“舞台CP商业化”的常见矛盾：节目组通过暧昧叙事收割流量，艺人则需平衡宣传需求与私人空间。张远的果断辟谣，既是对个人原则的坚守（“恋爱是私事”），也是对合作关系的维护（“业务能力是核心”）。
目前张远正筹备跨年演唱会，王霏霏亦专注新舞台，双方均未再回应此事。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [8, 40, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "和你一起有关系", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227939500655495", "index": 40, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "钟渊救我", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227967544560240", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "帧间雨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227947801975581", "index": 42, "label": ""}], "name": "和你一起有关系", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.896.896.50/7378f2e1ly8h6wjf7psppj20ow0owabq.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761973878&ssig=cRI63Dj6AA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227939500655495", "vType": 0}}```

> 注：部分内容涉及节目剪辑争议及粉丝观点，请理性甄别信息源。
